src:
Aji Santoso Akui Belum Banyak Beri Sentuhan Jelang Duel Kontra Tira Persikabo
07 Nov 2019, 04:24 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pelatih Persebaya Surabaya, Aji Santoso mengaku belum banyak memberi sentuhan pada skuatnya jelang pertandingan melawan PS Tira Persikabo. Sebab, dia punya waktu yang cukup terbatas.
Aji Santoso bergabung dengan Persebaya sejak Kamis (31/10/2019) lalu. Sementara, dia sudah harus membawa timnya ke markas Tira Persikabo dengan waktu persiapan kurang lebih sepekan.
"Masih banyak yang belum saya sentuh, tetapi yang jelas kami coba menanamkan kepada pemain, main dengan cara seperti yang saya inginkan," kata Aji Santoso kepada awak media.
Sebenarnya menurut Aji, jika punya banyak waktu, dia akan memoles timnya secara bertahap. Dia akan memulai dengan membenahi pertahanan, lini tengah, baru kemudian di lini depan.
"Cuma kemarin saya mulai dengan yang langsung tim karena waktunya tidak ada, saya mulai langsung complex training," jelas Aji.

Scroll ke bawah untuk informasi selengkapnya ya Bolaneters
text:
Aji Santoso Admits Not Much Touch Ahead of the Tira Persikabo Counter Duel
Nov 7 2019, 04:24 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persebaya Surabaya coach, Aji Santoso claimed not to give much touch to his squad ahead of the match against PS Tira Persikabo. Because, he has a fairly limited time.
Aji Santoso joined Persebaya since last Thursday (10/31/2019). Meanwhile, he had to bring his team to the Tira Persikabo headquarters with a week of preparation.
"There are still many things that I have not yet touched, but what is clear is that we are trying to invest in players, playing the way I want," Aji Santoso told the media.
Actually according to Aji, if you have a lot of time, he will polish his team gradually. He will start by fixing the defense, midfield, then in the front lines.
"Only yesterday I started with the direct team because the time was not there, I started complex training right away," explained Aji.

Scroll down for more information, Bolaneters
